Name: The Witch's Apprentice: A Magical Mishap
About the game: What a mess! Grimelda, a young witch, wanted to give her hair a little makeover when suddenly a tiny drop of her hair dye dripped into the magic cauldron of her aunt! And then it happened... BOOM! A big bang followed by a massive explosion! Now the whole, beautiful forest is covered with nasty, purple ooze! The young witch must clean everything up before her aunt comes back...
